project_metadata.architecture_pattern: Multi-tenant MVC with Role-Based Access Control

core_value_proposition.problem_statement: Organizations with multiple contractors and employees need a centralized system to track daily attendance, manage mandays/overtime, and provide role-based access to attendance data for different stakeholders (management, admins, supervisors).
core_value_proposition.solution: A multi-tenant web application that enables centralized attendance tracking with sophisticated access control, allowing root administrators full system access, company admins to manage their company data, and supervisors to view only their assigned employees with optional date-range restrictions.
key_benefits: Centralized attendance tracking across multiple companies
Automated CSV/Excel data import with validation
Mandays and overtime calculation and tracking
Supervisor access request workflow with admin approval

target_users.needs: Full system oversight, user management, backup/restore, cross-company analytics
Company-level attendance management, data uploads, supervisor access control
View attendance for assigned employees, request additional access, monitor team attendance

functional_requirements.requirement: System shall authenticate users with username and password
System shall enforce role-based access control (Root, Admin, User1)
System shall support CSV/Excel upload for attendance data
System shall support CSV/Excel upload for mandays data
System shall display attendance records with pagination (50 per page)
System shall filter attendance by date range, employee, company, status, overstay
System shall export filtered attendance data to Excel format
User1 shall request access to employees via approval workflow
Admin shall approve or reject User1 access requests
System shall enforce date-range based access for User1
Root and Admin shall create, edit, delete users
Root and Admin shall edit and delete attendance records
Root shall create full database backups in JSON format
Root shall restore database from backup with preview
System shall log all access control actions
System shall log all data upload operations
System shall isolate data by company
System shall validate unique (EP NO, Date) constraint
System shall display role-based statistics on dashboard
System shall track and display mandays with overtime as decimal

non_functional_requirements.requirement: System shall load paginated lists within 2 seconds
System shall handle 100,000+ attendance records efficiently
System shall support multiple concurrent users
System shall protect against SQL injection
System shall protect against XSS attacks
System shall protect against CSRF attacks
non_functional_requirements.current_status: Met - CSRF tokens on all forms

non_functional_requirements.requirement: System shall be responsive (mobile and desktop)
System shall maintain data integrity with constraints
non_functional_requirements.current_status: Met - Foreign keys and unique constraints

non_functional_requirements.requirement: System shall log all critical operations
